did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: The Peter E. Lynch Railroad Collection consists of materials almost exclusively associated with the New York, New Haven & Hartford Railroad (a.k.a. New Haven Railroad), including timetables, arranged package car service lists, and train order forms. Also includes a Western Maryland Railroad mortgage bond (1870) and a Penn Central timetable (1969).

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Peter E. Lynch, born on October 23, 1945, graduated from Brown University and received an MBA from Rutgers University. He worked in management positions for the New York, New Haven & Hartford Railroad, Penn Central, Conrail, and the Housatonic Railroad, and later as a railroad consultant. He was the author of New Haven Railroad (St. Paul, MN: MBI, 2003) and Penn Central Railroad (St. Paul, MN : MBI, 2004).
Peter E. Lynch died on June 14, 2011, in Worcester, Massachusetts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Unless otherwise noted the collection consists of materials associated with the New York, New Haven & Hartford Railroad (a.k.a. New Haven Railroad), including timetables, arranged package car service lists, and train order forms. Also includes a Western Maryland Railroad mortgage bond (1870) and a Penn Central timetable (1969).

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of southern New England railroad records. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

arrangement.p: The materials were arranged in chronological order.
